Kalteng Putra Siap Terima Konsekuensi, tapi Nilai Polisi Reaktif
03 Nov 2019, 07:42 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Jajaran Manajemen Kalteng Putra menyatakan siap menerima risiko atau konsekuensi, terhadap berbagai hal yang dianggap sebagai sebuah pelanggaran dalam pelaksanaan Liga 1 Indonesia.
"Apa pun risikonya harus kami terima. Untuk sanksi saya kira, Persebaya yang bakar lapangan saja dibiarkan oleh polisi, sedangkan kami yang begitu saja, polisi terlalu reaktif," kata Perwakilan Manajemen Kalteng Putra Budi Santoso di Palangka Raya, Ahad.
Kalteng Putra tengah disorot karena tindakan Gubernur Kalimantan Tengah Sugianto Sabran yang melempar botol ke lapangan saat laga melawan Persib Bandung, Jumat, 1 November 2019. Ketika ditegur, Sabran saat itu malah memarahi polisi.
Budi Santoso mengatakan, jika sanksi yang Kalteng Putra terima tidak sesuai dengan aturan, maka siap untuk mengajukan banding. Selain itu pihaknya juga akan menyurati Persatuan Sepak Bola Seluruh Indonesia (PSSI) terkait ketidakadilan dalam berbagai pertandingan.
Ketidakadilan itu terjadi pada beberapa pertandingan berbeda, mulai dari gol Kalteng Putra yang dianulir, hadiah penalti untuk lawan yang merugikan pihaknya, hingga hal-hal lainnya yang tidak sesuai.
Disinggung tentang dugaan adanya oknum atau mafia bola, Budi mengaku tak begitu memahami hal tersebut. Hanya saja sewaktu melawan Persela Lamongan dan menurutnya Kalteng Putra juga mengalami sejumlah kerugian selama pertandingan, namun malah dituding melakukan pengaturan skor.
"Kami tidak mengerti, dari sisi mana bisa menganggap Kalteng Putra melakukan pengaturan skor dengan wasit," tegasnya saat dijumpai di halaman Istana Isen Mulang Palangka Raya.
Selanjutnya ia juga berharap, agar dengan terpilihnya Ketua PSSI yang baru bisa membawa kemajuan terhadap persepakbolaan di Indonesia. Khususnya peningkatan serta perbaikan mutu wasit beserta perangkatnya.
Jika ada oknum perangkat pertandingan yang terbukti bersalah karena melakukan pelanggaran maupun penyimpangan, maka harusnya diberikan sanksi tegas, misalnya tidak ditugaskan kembali untuk memimpin pertandingan.
Budi juga menegaskan, hingga saat ini tak ada dari jajaran Manajemen Kalteng Putra yang mengundurkan diri dari jabatan yang masing-masing mereka emban. "Sementara ini secara resmi belum ada yang mengundurkan diri," kata dia.

Kalteng Putra is Ready to Accept the Consequences, but the Value of the Police is Reactive
03 Nov 2019, 07:42 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Kalteng Putra Management has stated that they are ready to accept risks or consequences for various things that are considered as violations in the implementation of League 1 Indonesia.
"Whatever the risk we have to accept. For sanctions I think, Persebaya who burned the field was left by the police, while we are just like that, the police are too reactive," said Central Kalimantan Management Representative Putra Budi Santoso in Palangka Raya on Sunday.
Kalteng Putra is being highlighted because of the actions of Central Kalimantan Governor Sugianto Sabran who threw a bottle on the field during the match against Persib Bandung, Friday, November 1, 2019. When reprimanded, Sabran at that time even scolded the police.
Budi Santoso said, if the sanctions that Kalteng Putra received were not in accordance with the rules, they were ready to appeal. In addition, his party will also write to the Indonesian Football Association (PSSI) related to injustice in various matches.
Injustice has occurred in several different matches, ranging from the Kalteng Putra goal that was annulled, penalty prizes for opponents who harmed his side, to other things that are not appropriate.
Mentioned about the alleged existence of unscrupulous or mafia ball, Budi claimed not to understand that. It's just that when against Persela Lamongan and according to him Kalteng Putra also suffered a number of losses during the match, but instead was accused of making a score fixing.
"We do not understand, from what side can we consider Kalteng Putra to make a score adjustment with a referee," he said when found in the courtyard of the Palace Isen Mulang Palangka Raya.
Furthermore, he also hoped that the election of the new PSSI Chair could bring progress towards football in Indonesia. Especially the improvement and improvement in the quality of referees and their equipment.
If there are persons who are found guilty of committing a violation or deviation, they should be given strict sanctions, for example not being re-assigned to lead the match.
Budi also emphasized that until now none of the Kalteng Putra Management ranks resigned from their respective positions. "While this is officially no one has resigned," he said.
